title: 10 downright crazy excuses for calling in sick
text:
Every year CareerBuilder.com works with Harris Poll and surveys workers and hiring managers to find the craziest excuses for calling in sick that employees give. Most of us have probably heard the more prosaic ones -- I'm not feeling well, I have a cold, I had too much to drink last night (yup, I once heard that from an employee).
See the full story at Inc. Magazine
